title: How Real Leaders Lead & Develop Culture with Benito Ortiz
itunes:title: How Real Leaders Lead & Develop Culture with Benito Ortiz
description:
What makes a workplace tick? We all probably know by now that it isn’t dumbass motivational posters and snooze-worthy team meetings. What makes a team work entirely depends on the people on it and the values behind it.
 
Benito Ortiz is the founder and owner of Strategic Insurance Group and a company culture and leadership wizard. Having led teams since he was barely 21 years old, Benito throws all his insight towards making himself and his employees better, stronger, and more successful.
 
On this episode of Underdog Empowerment, Zach and Benito break down the foundational pieces of successful culture within a business, including following through and sticking to your core values as a leader, striking a balance between pushing for new goals and celebrating wins, and the insane results that show up when you and your people make an actual commitment to each other. Tune in for an episode that will completely revolutionize the way you look at your team (not to mention how you lead it).
 
Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/benito-ortiz
 
Get More Involved: 
 
  1. Leave A Review & Subscribe On iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/underdog-empowerment/id1373572178
  2. Free A-to-Z roadmap on launching a top-shelf podcast: https://underdogempowerment.com/roadmap
  3. Access Our Top Resource Recommendations: https://underdogempowerment.com/resources/
  4. Subscribe On YouTube: https://underdogempowerment.com/youtube
